title: Wizard Academy - Novel Updates
tags: Academy   Magic   Weak to Strong   Witches   Wizards   World Travel
author: 肥皂有点滑
description:
My name is Jiang Zhu, an orphan with a unique hobby.

It’s a bizarre thing to say but everything began when an unknown coffin from Huang He Xuan Guan scenic area1 fell in front of me and dried up corpse crawled out of it.

At this moment, the ancient and mysterious witchcraft of longevity broke through the dust of history.

For the sake of the living and my meager income, I cannot help but open a Wizarding Academy to use witchcraft… with millions of students.>
